issues.description: The template’s Lecture constructor accepts only three parameters (lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents), but the problem statement and UML diagram require a constructor initializing all five attributes (including numberOfLecturers and numberOfTutors). The solution implements a five-parameter constructor, so students following the template will be unable to implement or test the intended constructor signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the template’s Lecture constructor signature to: public Lecture(String lectureName, int numberOfInscribedStudents, int numberOfGuestStudents, int numberOfLecturers, int numberOfTutors) so it matches the five attributes specified in the problem statement and solution.
